tool_description: Classifies legal text and cases into issue categories and topic areas using legal taxonomy and machine learning approaches.

text_input.description: Legal text, case facts, or issue description to classify

classification_system.description: Classification taxonomy: westlaw, lexis, custom, broad

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0.3-1.0) for classification assignment

max_categories.description: Maximum number of categories to return (1-20)

error_messages: Empty text input: Provide legal text content for classification
Invalid classification system: Use one of [westlaw, lexis, custom, broad]
Invalid confidence threshold: Set value between 0.3 and 1.0
Invalid max categories: Set between 1 and 20 categories
Text too short: Provide sufficient text content for reliable classification
usage: Provide text_input and optionally specify classification_system, confidence_threshold, and max_categories. Returns categorized legal issues with confidence scores.

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores (0-1) for each assigned category

topic_tags.description: Relevant legal topic tags and keywords
